content:
# The furnace currently contains 9 iron ore and has successfully produced 33 iron plates. However, it is now showing that it has no fuel, which explains why it has stopped processing further.
# 
# To continue production, I need to add more fuel (coal) to the furnace. I have 5 coal in my inventory, which should be sufficient to get the furnace back to work.

# Let's insert the coal into the furnace to resume its operation.
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, furnace, quantity=5)  # Inserting all 5 coal into the furnace.
print(f"Inventory updated to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Displaying updated inventory after insertion.
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Displaying the current state of entities on the map.
